game.name: File Manager
game.desc: Enables you to browse the JELOS filesystem and manage files directly on your device. You can also use this tool to copy files from external drives to your JELOS filesystem.

game.name: Install JELOS
game.desc: Use this utility to install JELOS to the local storage on your device. Note: This process will wipe the drive that you choose to install JELOS on.

game.name: PortMaster
game.desc: PortMaster is a simple tool that allows you to download various game ports that are available for 351Elec, ArkOS, JelOS, RetroOZ, and TheRA for ARM based devices. You can find details at github.com/christianhaitian/PortMaster

game.name: RCLONE Backup
game.desc: Backup your saves to a cloud drive using RCLONE. Please make sure you have followed the steps at jelos.org to set up RCLONE first.

game.name: RCLONE Restore
game.desc: Restores your saves from a cloud drive using RCLONE. Please make sure you have followed the steps at jelos.org to set up RCLONE first.

game.name: Remove ._ Files
game.desc: This tool can be run to remove hidden ._ files created by the MacOS filesystem

game.name: Start Cemu
game.desc: Opens the Cemu GUI (WiiU) to enable global configuration changes to be made directly to the emulator. It's recommended to have a mouse and keyboard available to modify settings.

game.name: Start PCSX2
game.desc: Opens the PCSX2 GUI (PS2) to enable global configuration changes to be made directly to the emulator. It's recommended to have a mouse and keyboard available to modify settings.

game.name: Start PPSSPP
game.desc: Opens the PPSSPP GUI (PSP) to enable global configuration changes to be made directly to the emulator.

game.name: Start RetroArch (32-bit)
game.desc: Opens the RetroArch GUI (32-bit version) to enable global configuration changes to be made directly to the emulator.

game.name: Start RetroArch (64-bit)
game.desc: Opens the RetroArch GUI (64-bit version) to enable global configuration changes to be made directly to the emulator.

game.name: Start RPCS3
game.desc: Opens the RPCS3 GUI (PS3) to enable configuration changes to be made directly to the emulator. You can use this to set up firmware, update controls and install packages. It's recommended to have a mouse and keyboard available to modify settings.

game.name: Start ScummVM
game.desc: Opens the ScummVM GUI to enable global configuration changes to be made directly to the emulator. It's recommended to have a mouse and keyboard available to modify settings.

game.name: Start Xemu
game.desc: Opens the Xemu GUI (Xbox) to enable global configuration changes to be made directly to the emulator. It's recommended to have a mouse and keyboard available to modify settings.

game.name: Start Yuzu
game.desc: Opens the Yuzu GUI (Switch) to enable global configuration changes to be made directly to the emulator. It's recommended to have a mouse and keyboard available to modify settings.
